typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		Data as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as boolean,
		{_col9_} as boolean,
		{_col10_} as short,
		{_col11_} as short,
		{_col12_} as short,
		{_col13_} as short,
		{_col14_} as string,
		{_col15_} as integer,
		{_col16_} as integer,
		{_col17_} as short,
		{_col18_} as string,
		{_col19_} as double,
		{_col20_} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(Data = left(Data,10),
		Time = right(Data,12)) ~> DataTimeExtract
DataTimeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(Data,'yyyy-mm-dd'))),
	iucr = count({_col3_})) ~> DayOfWeekCount
DataTimeExtract filter(month(toDate(Data)) == 4) ~> OnlyApril
OnlyApril select(mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		{_col1_},
		Data,
		Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CrimeFileApril_fm.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkApril
DayOfWeekCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CrimeByDayOfWeek_fm.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkDayOfWeek
